name: Saison
description: A farmhouse ale with a dry, spicy, and fruity character.

name: Gose
description: A sour and salty German wheat beer with a refreshing citrus tang.

name: Hazy New England IPA
description: A juicy, hazy IPA bursting with tropical fruit flavors and low bitterness.

name: Mexican Lager
description: A crisp and light-bodied lager with a smooth, slightly sweet finish.

name: Hawaiian Pineapple Sour
description: A tropical sour beer with bright pineapple flavors and a tart finish.

name: California Common
description: A hybrid beer with a toasty malt backbone and a crisp, slightly woody hop character.
